tool_description: An API showing the latest Global Climate Change News from various news sources.
name: Climate Change Latest News
title: Climate Change Latest News

api_list.name: Get climate change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back news articles about climate change from various media networks around the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/aljazeera"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get climate change News from a specific media network
api_list.description: This end point will return back  News articles about climate change from a specific single media network
